histogram.name: Mac.AppClonefileError
histogram.summary: The `errno` from the `clonefile` syscall. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.AppCodeSignCloneCount
histogram.summary: The current count of app clones in the code sign clone temp dir. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.AppCodeSignCloneCreationTime
histogram.summary: The time it took in milliseconds to create the browser app code sign clone. Logged once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.AppCodeSignCloneExists
histogram.summary: The existence of the clone on disk. This histogram is emitted up to two times. Once, immediately after successful clone creation. Then again, if the clone is prematurely removed.

histogram.name: Mac.AppFileSystemType
histogram.summary: The file system type where the running instance of Chrome is installed. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.AppHardLinkError
histogram.summary: The `errno` from the `link` syscall. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.AppUpgradeCodeSignatureValidationStatus
histogram.summary: The dynamic code signature validation status of Chrome with a pending Chrome update on disk. A single metric is emitted about an hour after an update to the running instance of Chrome has been staged on disk.

histogram.name: Mac.Fullscreen.LocationBarViewScreenY
histogram.summary:
Records the location bar's screen Y coordinate when the omnibox popup is shown while the browser is in fullscreen mode.
This histogram is for debugging crbug.com/365733574, that bubbles are misplaced in mac fullscreen.

histogram.name: Mac.Fullscreen.OmniboxPopupTargetScreenY
histogram.summary:
Records the target Y coordinate of the omnibox popup when it is shown while the browser is in fullscreen mode.
This histogram is for debugging crbug.com/365733574, that bubbles are misplaced in mac fullscreen.

histogram.name: Mac.Fullscreen.OverlayNSWindowScreenY
histogram.summary:
Records the overlay NSWindow's screen Y coordinate when the omnibox popup is shown while the browser is in fullscreen mode.
This histogram is for debugging crbug.com/365733574, that bubbles are misplaced in mac fullscreen.

histogram.name: Mac.Fullscreen.OverlayWidgetScreenY
histogram.summary:
Records the overlay widget's screen Y coordinate when the omnibox popup is shown while the browser is in fullscreen mode.
This histogram is for debugging crbug.com/365733574, that bubbles are misplaced in mac fullscreen.

histogram.name: Mac.LaunchApplicationResult
histogram.summary: The result of calls to base::mac::LaunchApplication, logged once for every invocation of that method.

histogram.name: Mac.ProcessRequirement.CurrentProcessValid
histogram.summary: The result of validating the current process against a same signing identity process requirement. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.ProcessRequirement.FallbackValidationCategory.Result
histogram.summary: The result of retrieving the validation category of the current process via the fallback code path. 0 on success, or an`OSStatus` value. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.ProcessRequirement.TeamIdentifier.Result
histogram.summary: The result of retrieving the team identifier of the current process. 0 on success, the `errno` value from the `csops` system call otherwise. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.ProcessRequirement.Timing.{Operation}
histogram.summary: The time taken to {Operation}. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

variant.name: ValidateSameIdentity
variant.summary: validate the current process against a same identity requirement

histogram.name: Mac.ProcessRequirement.ValidationCategory.Result
histogram.summary: The result of retrieving the validation category of the current process. 0 on success, the `errno` value from the `csops` system call otherwise. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.

histogram.name: Mac.ProcessRequirement.ValidationRequired
histogram.summary: Whether ProcessRequirement validation was short-circuited due to the requirement not needing code signature validation. This histogram is emitted whenever a ProcessRequirement is used to validate a process.

histogram.name: Mac.ProcessRequirement.ValidationResult
histogram.summary: The result of validating a ProcessRequirement. This histogram is emitted whenever a ProcessRequirement is used to validate a process.

histogram.name: Mac.ProcessRequirement.{Field}.HasExpectedValue
histogram.summary: Whether the {Field} retrieved for the current process matched the expected value. This will only be emitted if the {Field} was successfully retrieved. This histogram is emitted once at browser startup.
